features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Multi-tenant authentication with role-based access control (RBAC) supporting SUPER_ADMIN and CLIENT_USER roles

features.name: Document Management
features.description: Complete document lifecycle management with upload, processing, validation, and status tracking

features.name: OCR Processing
features.description: Advanced OCR text extraction with multiple strategies and confidence scoring using Tesseract.js

features.name: AI Integration
features.description: Multi-provider AI analysis for document categorization, validation, and data extraction with OpenAI and GLM-4-Plus

features.name: Multi-Tenant Architecture
features.description: Complete tenant isolation with Row Level Security (RLS) ensuring data separation between clients

features.name: Dashboard and Analytics
features.description: Real-time operational dashboards with financial statistics, document metrics, and AI performance monitoring

features.name: Financial Management
features.description: Comprehensive financial document processing including expense tracking, cost centers, and supplier management

features.name: Document Workflow
features.description: Automated status transitions and workflow management for document processing lifecycle

features.name: File Storage
features.description: Local and cloud storage integration with support for multiple document formats

features.name: API Endpoints
features.description: RESTful API with comprehensive endpoints for authentication, document management, and entity operations

features.name: Database Schema
features.description: Structured PostgreSQL schema with Drizzle ORM supporting multi-tenancy and complex relationships

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Modern React components with Radix UI, Tailwind CSS, dark/light theme support, and responsive design

features.name: Validation System
features.description: Comprehensive data validation with schema validation, form validation, and business rule enforcement

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Administrative interface for tenant management, user administration, and system configuration

features.name: Testing Infrastructure
features.description: Comprehensive testing setup with unit tests, integration tests, and multi-tenant validation
